name: Four Seasons in Bosphorus - Bidders Edition

metadata.name: Four Seasons in Bosphorus - Winter #1/8
metadata.description: A working manâ€™s typical morning routine during his journey to work in the Bosphorus Strait in winter. The Bosphorus ferries of Istanbul provide special experiences to its passengers through calming and entertaining them; thus they are regarded as more than a transportation alternative by Istanbulites.
